body_html:
For what you wrote concerning deleted / non-existing teams @alicetragedy: @carpodaster is right -> putting together the Mentor::Application object requires some values originated by the corresponding team.
So if no Team, no Mentor::Application ✔️
body_text:
For what you wrote concerning deleted / non-existing teams @alicetragedy: @carpodaster is right -> putting together the Mentor::Application object requires some values originated by the corresponding team.
So if no Team, no Mentor::Application ✔️
body:
For what you wrote concerning **deleted** / **non-existing** teams @alicetragedy: @carpodaster is right -> putting together the `Mentor::Application` object requires some values originated by the corresponding team.
So if no `Team`, no `Mentor::Application` ✔️
